The following files have MPC-HC specific custom code (compared to FFmpeg):

* config.asm
* config.h
* makefile

* libavcodec/allcodecs.c
* libavcodec/avcodec.h
* libavcodec/h264.c
* libavcodec/h264.h
* libavcodec/mpeg12.c
* libavcodec/mpeg12.h
* libavcodec/mpegvideo.c
* libavcodec/pthread.c
* libavcodec/thread.h
* libavcodec/utils.c
* libavcodec/vc1dec.c

* libavutil/mem.c


The following files are available only in MPC-HC (compared to FFmpeg):

* mpc_helper.c
* libavcodec/dxva.h
* libavcodec/h264_dxva.c
* libavcodec/h264_recov.c
* libavcodec/vc1_dxva.c
